'''Crystal Cores''' are a crafting material obtained by catching [[Crystalflies]].

==How to Obtain==
This material is obtained from catching any type of crystalfly in the wild.

==Trivia==
* Crystalflies will not spawn when it's raining.
** Since it doesn't rain in [[Dragonspine]], Crystalflies will always spawn there.
* The following birthday mails included Crystal Cores:
** [[Birthday/Xiao#I got you some Crystalflies.|Xiao's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Crystal Cores)
** [[Birthday/Fischl#Day Of Destiny...|Fischl's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Crystal Cores)
** [[Birthday/Kaeya#With the Wind|Kaeya's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Crystal Cores)
